item.title: EP 147 - The Perils Of Ghost Hunting
item.itunes:title: The Perils Of Ghost Hunting
item.description:
Today we visit Santa Barbara county in California and get creeped out! Then we take a look back at one of my most dangerous ghost hunts!

 

Santa Barbara county is a peaceful place to live. And a hellish place to die!

(This is Jason from July 9th, 2022. This is the Burger King Ghost episode. I am adding this in because I keep forgetting which episode this story is in and I keep losing my mind.)

And then we go back in time to my early 20s when I was a ghost hunter. But what happens when the hunter becomes the hunted? OR the hunter just doesn't plan things out very well!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

 

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

 

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

 

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Santa Barbara County Ghosts

http://www.weirdca.com/index.php?type=30

 

Fifty States Of Shadow Land

https://books.google.com/books?id=FEdbDwAAQBAJ&pg=PA161&lpg=PA161&dq=greenwood+graveyard+ghost+big+hands&source=bl&ots=jrrDS4L-pO&sig=V6drUO2Mip0m7-oclmeF2vCuA0Q&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj09_rasunfAhVEyFQKHX7SBA8Q6AEwC3oECAkQAQ#v=onepage&q=greenwood%20graveyard%20ghost%20big%20hands&f=false

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
